post.description: Creates a single person in the system with the given identifiers.

requestBody.description: Takes in the ID of the person to be created and a list of identifiers, defined by the identifier type and value.

get.description: Get information for the person with the given personID.

delete.description: Delete a person with the given personID. Be aware that the person is soft-deleted with a grace period set with query parameters(defaulting to 30 days)

put.description: Onboard person to the receipt service
Offboard person to the receipt service

get.description: Get a list of all expense management systems this person has connected

post.description: Creates a single identifier in the system for a given person

requestBody.description: Takes in an dentifier, defined by the identifier type and value.

put.description: Updates a single identifier in the system for a given person

requestBody.description: Takes in an dentifier, defined by the identifier type and value and updates.

delete.description: Delete an identifier with identifierID from a person with personID

get.description: Fetch a list of all receipts for the given personID.

get.summary: Get GDPR-compliant list of all receipts for a person
get.description: Fetches GDPR-compliant version of all receipt for the given personID.
Fetch a receipt for the given personID and receiptID.

delete.description: Delete a receipt belonging the given personID, with a receiptID. Be aware that the receipt is soft-deleted with a grace period set with query parameters(defaulting to 30 days)

get.description: Fetch a list of all chains for a person sorted by purchase_date.
Fetch a list of all receipts for the given personID and chainID.
Fetch a list of receipts that have been marked for deletion

post.description: Expense receipt to the given expense management system

requestBody.description: Defines the receipt to be expensed and to what expense management system

id.description: The id of the expense management system

requestBody.description: Takes in the ID of the person the receipt should be given to.

202.description: The gifted receipt was successfully claimed

id.description: The id of the gift receipt created

403.description: Gifted receipt link has already claimed or expired

example.error_message: gifted receipt link has already been claimed

put.description: Reject all new receipts from the given chainID for the given personID

409.description: This person has already rejected this chain

put.description: Start receiving receipts again from given chainID for the given personID

409.description: This person hasn't rejected this chain

error_detail: Chain wasn't rejected by the user.

get.description: Fetch a barcode with the given type and value in image format.

parameters.name: pdf417encoding
parameters.description: Defines the encoding level of PDF417 barcodes [1, 8]

parameters.name: ar
parameters.description: aspect ratio if the generated barcode, ignored if both height and width is given

parameters.name: fg
parameters.description: Forground color of the barcode, accepts RGBA in hex format (#RRGGBBAA)

parameters.name: bg
parameters.description: Background color of the barcode, accepts RGBA in hex format (#RRGGBBAA)

Fetch a list of all chains.

error_message.description: A descriptive string describing the error

id.description: ID of the user that will be created

identifiers.description: List of identifiers for this user

id.description: ID of the user that was created
ID of the identifier that was created

item_display_fields.description: The extra fields from receipt items that should be displayed in the app

id.description: The id of the expense management system

name.description: The name of the expense management system

icon_url.description: The URL to an EMS's icon

Limit.name: limit
Limit.description: Max number of results to return

SortBy.name: sort_by
SortBy.description: Name of the column to sort results by

DrErrorCode.name: X-Dr-Error-Code
DrErrorCode.description: Represents the error code that is being returned

AcceptJSON.name: accept
AcceptJSON.description: defines the receipt schema format that will be returned, invalid values default to RC2

Days.name: days
Days.description: Defines the number of days an object can be restored

Order.name: order
Order.description: Determines if results are ordered in ascending or descending order

Search.name: search
Search.description: Search based on store name and item description

UnauthorizedError.description: Access token is missing or invalid
